parameters.query:
SELECT
  m.title,
  m.year,
  m.duration_min,
  m.rating,
  m.audience_rating,
  m.genres,
  m.directors,
  m.studio,
  m.content_rating,
  m.release_date
FROM media_entries m
WHERE m.type = 'movie'
  AND (
    LOWER(m.title) = $1
    OR LOWER(m.title) LIKE $2
    OR LOWER(m.title) LIKE $3
  )
ORDER BY
  (LOWER(m.title) = $4) DESC,
  (LOWER(m.title) LIKE $5) DESC,
  NULLIF(INSTR(LOWER(m.title), $6), 0),
  CASE WHEN $7 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE ABS(COALESCE(m.year,0) - $8) END,
  LENGTH(m.title)
LIMIT 1;
